# Portfolio Website - Copilot Instructions

## Project Overview
Modern portfolio website built with Vite, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

## Tech Stack
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Framework**: React 18
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v3
- **Routing**: React Router v6
- **Hosting**: GitHub Pages

## Project Structure
```
src/
├── components/       # Reusable components (Header, Footer, Layout)
├── pages/           # Route pages (Home, About, Projects, Contact)
├── App.tsx          # Main app with routing
├── index.css        # Tailwind styles
└── main.tsx         # Entry point
```

## Completed Setup
- ✅ Vite + React + TypeScript project initialized
- ✅ Tailwind CSS v3 configured
- ✅ React Router v6 installed and set up
- ✅ Component structure created (Layout, Header, Footer)
- ✅ Four pages created (Home, About, Projects, Contact)
- ✅ Responsive navigation with mobile menu
- ✅ Custom color scheme defined
- ✅ Development server running at http://localhost:5173

## Customization Notes
- Primary colors defined in `tailwind.config.js`
- Custom component classes in `src/index.css`
- All content uses placeholder text ready for personalization
- Social links in Footer component ready to be updated
